translations: v.干涉，管闲事，干预他人之事；瞎搞，乱弄

sentences.sentence: Already some people are asking whether scientists have any right to meddle in such matters.
sentences.translation: 已经有些人在问科学家是否有权利去干涉此类事情。

sentences.sentence: Canty roared out, "Thou'lt meddle, wilt thou?"
sentences.translation: 康第吼道：“你要管闲事，是不是？”

sentences.sentence: He is suspicious of attempts to meddle in the internal business of others.
sentences.translation: 他对企图干涉他人内部事务的行为表示怀疑。
